question: Which district has bagged top position in implementing Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY)?
explanation:
Union Ministry of Rural Development has declared the list of the top performing 30 districts in the country for implementing the PMGSY programme.
Himachal Pradesh's Mandi district has bagged the top position in successful implementation of Pradhan Mantri Gram Sadak Yojana (PMGSY). The state also secured second position at the national level for construction of roads under PMGSY.
